The Abhorrent spectre is a superior variant of the normal aberrant spectre. It has a 1/200 chance of spawning upon killing an aberrant spectre if the player has unlocked Bigger and Badder for 150 Slayer reward points from any Slayer master.

Contents

  • 1 Drops
    • 1.1 Weapons and armour
    • 1.2 Herbs
    • 1.3 Seeds
    • 1.4 Coins
    • 1.5 Other
    • 1.6 Gem drop table
    • 1.7 Tertiary
    • 1.8 Superior Slayer tertiary
  • 2 Changes
  • 3 Trivia

Drops[edit | edit source]

In addition to 100% drops and tertiary drops, superior slayer monsters will always roll 3 additional items, of which only 1 roll may be from the superior Tertiary Table. The other rolls are performed on the regular counterpart's table; their displayed drop chances represent a single roll.

Drop rates estimated based on 820,736 kills from the Drop Rate Project, unless otherwise cited.

The average Abhorrent spectre kill is worth 71,504.31.

The average Abhorrent spectre kill while on a Konar task is worth 73,565.85.

Herbs[edit | edit source]

There is a 78/128 chance of rolling the herb drop table. When the drop table is rolled, there is an 11/26 chance of dropping 1 herb, 11/26 chance of dropping 2 herbs and a 4/26 chance of dropping 3 herbs, leading to an average of 1.73 herbs per roll.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
23 February 2017
(update | poll)

The abhorrent spectre was given a graphical update to be more distinguishable from their regular variant.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • Their in-game models resemble and they use the same animations as giants, similarly to nechryarchs.
